name: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style
desc: Constants indicating the layout of a tab bar item's content.

items.name: case stacked
items.desc: A vertically stacked icon and title.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in regular-width environments.

items.name: case compactInline
items.desc: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.
